summary: Physical traps will now apply a proper push.
descriptionHtml:
First of all I apologize for my bad englando, It's not my main language.

...and I love ragdolls physics.

[u][size=4]Description
[/size][/u]This mod will make you be more cautious about triggers and physical traps...or pay with the price of the mighty ragdoll!
Some physical traps now will push how they should be, both npc's and player are affected.
Traps applying the ragdoll physics:
-Battering Ram
-Spike Wall
-Claw
-Slicer
-Swinging Mace
-Skull Ram
-Boulders
-Spikes
-Swinging Blades(there is an optional file to avoid those)
-Spinning Blade

[b][i]NOTE[/i][/b]: [i]sometimes the ragdoll physics will not be applied properly... but most of the time it should.[/i]

[u][size=4]Requirements
[/size][/u]-Skyrim

[size=4][u]Installation[/u][/size]
[size=2]Use your favorite mod installer (I really really suggest Mod Organizer) or just unzip it in the Data folder but ONLY USE ONE ESP![/size]

[size=4][u]Which esp to use?[/u][/size]
[b]Scary Traps.esp[/b] - This one have the main features.
[b]Scary Traps - 2x Damage.esp[/b] - This one make traps modified by this mod do 2x damage! and have higher scaling
[b]Scary Traps - No Swinging Blades.esp[/b] - Swinging blades will no longer ragdoll
[b]Scary Traps - No Swinging Blades - 2x Damage.esp[/b] - Same as above but traps modified by this mod will do 2x damage and will have higher scaling

(i.e. Swinging mace scales up to level 20, now will scale up to level 43 with the increased damage versions)

[size=2]It's up to you which one you want, USE ONLY ONE.[/size]


[u][size=3]Uninstallation
[/size][/u]Remove:
Scary Traps.esp
Scary Traps - 2x Damage.esp
Scary Traps - No Swinging Blade.esp
Scary Traps - No Swinging Blade - 2x Damage.esp
Data/Scripts/PhysicsTrapHit.pex
Data/Scripts/traphitbase.pex


[u][size=4]Compatibilities
[/size][/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31799/?]Traps Make Noise[/url] should be compatible, the "Dangerous" version is partially compatible ,just make sure to LOAD my mod after that. It also has a compatibility patch if you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11609/?]Follower Trap Safety[/url] mod.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11609/?]Follower Trap Safety[/url] should be compatible too, it doesn't touch any record or script of my mod.

Any mod that touch the physical traps records or traphitbase and physicstraphit scripts are not compatible.

Still don't know about other mods, feel free to ask and I will check it out :)


[u]Suggested Mods[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17491/?]D13 Faster GET UP STAND UP[/url] - HIGHLY RECOMENDED! You and NPC's will stand up faster.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31799/?]Traps Make Noise[/url] - This mod makes traps do MORE noise but as I said, make sure to LOAD my mod after "Dangerous" version If you use it.
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patches[/url] - Seriously, if you don't have those patches I don't know what are you doing in the Nexus.[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33395/?]SkyTweak[/url] - You should get this, you can set tweaks to your liking, very useful, and there is an option to increase trap damage up to 3.5x, but PHYSICAL TRAPS are NOT affected.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17214/?]No Spinning Death Animation[/url] - seriously...get this.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/?]Realistic Ragdolls and Force[/url] - another must have.

Hope you like it. :)

Credits:

Bethesda
author: Rudi91
